# presentationSourceItem

**Instance Property**

The item you can use as an anchor for subsequent presentations.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var presentationSourceItem: (any UIPopoverPresentationControllerSourceItem)? { get }
```

## Discussion

The system populates this property during the execution of the menu element’s action (its handler or selector). For example, for a menu element in a menu that presents from a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton], the system may populate this property with that button.

Use this property to specify where to anchor popovers when a person taps the menu element, like in the following code.

```swift
let share = UIAction(title: "Share") { [unowned self] action in
    let shareVC = UIActivityViewController(activityItems: items, applicationActivities: activities)
    shareVC.modalPresentationStyle = .popover
    shareVC.popoverPresentationController?.sourceItem = action.presentationSourceItem
    present(shareVC, animated: true)
}
```

## Managing the appearance

- **title**: A short display title for the menu element.
- **discoverabilityTitle**: A long, informative title to use in the keyboard shortcut overlay.
- **image**: An image that appears next to the menu element.
- **attributes**: The attributes that determine the style of the menu element.
